about.title: About Neco
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for digital success
about.description: We are a team of experienced developers and designers specializing in creating affordable, high-quality websites for local businesses in Uzbekistan. With expertise in backend development, DevOps, frontend design, and SEO, we deliver complete digital solutions.

process.title: Development

process.title: Launch & Training
process.description: Go live and learn to manage your site

items.question: What's included in lifetime support?
items.answer: Lifetime support includes bug fixes, security updates, content updates, and technical assistance for as long as you use our hosting. You'll never pay extra for maintenance.

items.question: How long does development take?
items.answer: Most websites are completed within 7-14 days, depending on complexity. We'll provide you with a specific timeline during our initial consultation.

items.question: Can I update my website myself?
items.answer: Yes! We provide training and documentation so you can make basic updates. For more complex changes, our support team is always available to help.

items.question: What if I need changes later?
items.answer: Minor changes and updates are included in your lifetime support. For major redesigns or new features, we offer affordable upgrade packages.

items.question: Do you work with businesses outside Uzbekistan?
items.answer: While we specialize in Uzbekistan businesses, we're happy to work with clients from neighboring countries. Contact us to discuss your project.

items.question: What if I don't have a domain yet?
items.answer: No problem! We'll help you choose and purchase the perfect domain name for your business as part of our service.
